author: carolinecollard
body:
Hi all, 

I am not sure to do the correct thing, but I would like to commit my changes in the file varGroups_cfi.py to include more variables for Caroline's groups option.

No idea if I need to desactivate something with respect to the commit of emilbols on Dec 20...

If you could tell me what to do in order to get also the modifications on varGroups_cfi.py applied on the other branches (for the 2018 campaign for example), it would be great.

Cheers,
Caroline
title: From cmssw 9 4 12
